bwg.corenlp_server_tasks module¶

Module contents¶

Rewriting standard tasks for the NLP pipeline using the Stanford CoreNLP server. The main motivation to do this lies in the following problem: When the respective Stanford tools are run through their NLTK wrappers, they load their necessary models from scratch every time. This slows down the pipeline quite a load. In contrast, the server loads them only once.

Also, this approach comes with some other merits as well:
  • Reducing the number of necessary Stanford model files
  • Avoiding using bulk operations like “parse_sents()” which complicate the current architecture of the pipeline
class bwg.corenlp_server_tasks.ServerDependencyParseTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.mixins.CoreNLPServerMixin, bwg.standard_tasks.DependencyParseTask

Luigi task that dependency-parses sentences in a corpus, but using a Stanford CoreNLP server.

edges_to_nodes(edges)¶

Turn a dependency tree representation based on nodes to a representation based on edges.

Parameters:edges (list) – List of tree edges.
Returns:Dictionary with the root node and a list of all nodes.
Return type:dict
class bwg.corenlp_server_tasks.ServerNERTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.mixins.CoreNLPServerMixin, bwg.standard_tasks.NERTask

Luigi task that performs Named Entity Recognition on a corpus, but using a Stanford CoreNLP server.

class bwg.corenlp_server_tasks.ServerNaiveOpenRelationExtractionTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.standard_tasks.NaiveOpenRelationExtractionTask

Luigi task that performs Open Relation extraction on a corpus. The only adjustment in this case are the requirements for this task, this task doesn’t use the CoreNLP server at all.

requires()¶
class bwg.corenlp_server_tasks.ServerPoSTaggingTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.mixins.CoreNLPServerMixin, bwg.standard_tasks.PoSTaggingTask

Luigi task that PoS tags a sentence in a corpus, but using a Stanford CoreNLP server.
